lines.text: It is embarrassing to see grown men run from their responsibilities. It is like seeing your parents drunk for the first time. They are afraid. To be a psychiatrist in this country is to be an expert on paranoia... whether you meant to be or not.

[to Dr. Bukhanovsky]
Why aren't you afraid?
I'm sorry. Do I look like a man of courage to you? I've always been interested in abnormal psychology. Which is a dangerous thing in the Soviet state.
I want to know, why are we arresting so many perfectly respectable doctors and party members?
Because we were told to.
You were told to investigate them, not detain them!
The party members who are doctors we detain for a very brief period of time. The party members who are sexual deviants, we intend to detain a little longer.

[to Burakov and Fetisov]
Together you make a wonderful person.
I have here...
I don't care what you have there!
Information...
Who cares!

About the nineteen year old boy you maintain in the town of Shakti! And the apartment you have arranged for him... and the gifts that you have given him... and the dates of your last three overnight visits. If you attempt to fire Lieutenant Burakov... now, or at any time... I will send all this to your wife.
I recommended you for this position.
I will always be indebted to you.
You think that a man is what he says.
He is, if he talks for a living.
How did you get these abrasions on the head of your penis?
A man is what he fights for.
I don't fight for anything.
I know.
To be a psychiatrist in this country (the Soviet Union) is to be an expert on paranoia, whether you meant to be or not.
Goddamn it! What is happening to me? My heart is pounding, my collar feels tight; what the hell is this?
Passion.

[addressing Bukhanovsky]
He'd say something witty, but he's overcome with emotion.

[to Dr. Bukhanovsky while Colonel Fetisov shakes the doctor's hand]
He'd say something witty but he's overcome with emotion right now.
Thank you both... and may I say that, together, you make a wonderful person.
You handled him quite deftly.
I've had it. I will not suffer that stupidity anymore!
He may be stupid, but he's in charge.
Blood test came back negative.
What?
Semen samples are type AB. Chikatilo is type A.

[sighs]
I don't believe it.
It's true.
What are you talking about "it's true"? What does that mean? Our blood test is for eleven variables. The FBI's is for one hundred and forty nine!

[grinning]
How do you know that?

[exasperated]
I saw it in a movie! What the hell difference does it make what the blood test says, you don't know what you're talking about!
There is no serial killer in the Soviet state.
